cards.rules_text: When Savage Gatherer dies, if it was enchanted or equipped, draw a card.
Create a tapped 3/3 green Rhino creature token. Put a vigilance counter on it if {C} was spent to cast this spell.

When Yanamo Trapper dies, choose one —
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
• Craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]

Deathtouch
Trophy {1}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Enchanted creature has deathtouch.

When Mournful Cavepainter enters the battlefield, if another creature died this turn, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
Tribeless Hermit gets +2/+0 as long as an artifact or creature has been put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

{2}{B}: Tap Hardy Mammoth or enchanted creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn. Activate only outside of combat.
Trophy {B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]

Menace
When Fearless Hunter enters the battlefield, mill three cards. Put a +1/+1 counter on Fearless Hunter if a creature card is milled this way.
Whenever an artifact or creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.
When Cautious Tracker enters the battlefield, up to one other Hunter you control get +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

Enchant creature
When Birth of Superstition enters the battlefield, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{C}: Primal Trapper gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

When Toolcraft Apprentice enters the battlefield, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]

When Sullen Mystic enters the battlefield, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
{T}: Add {C}.

Vigilance, trample
When Hunt Leader enters the battlefield, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
{G}, {T}: Craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
When Kuzam Wolftamer enters the battlefield, if there are four or more card types among permanents you control, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

Trample
Trophy {1}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Enchanted creature has trample.

Trample
Apex Snapper enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if {C}{C} was spent to cast it.

Hardy Goliath enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if {C}{C} was spent to cast it.
Hardy Goliath can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

Haste
{T}, Sacrifice Doomed Tracker: Craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
When Ancient Carving dies, draw a card.

Haste
Champion of the Amatar gets +1/+0 as long as it’s equipped.
Reach, haste

Haste
Whenever Fierce Hunter attacks, you may pay {C}. If you do, Fierce Hunter deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking.

When Amatar Outcast enters the battlefield, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
When Hunted Predator dies, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
When Amatar Beast-Speaker enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

When Mammoth Trackers enters the battlefield, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
Mammoth Trackers gets +3/+0 and has haste as long as you’ve created a token this turn.

Trample
Antediluvian Snapper has haste as long as you control a creature with base power 2 or less.

When Acuno Seer enters the battlefield, target player mills three cards.
Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
Fledgling Raptor gets +1/+1 and has flying as long as you control another creature with power 4 or greater.

Flying
Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]

Flash
Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]
Patient Tracker can’t be blocked as long as you control another creature with power 4 or greater.

Flying
Transitional Taxon enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if {C}{C} was spent to cast it.
When Frostcave Lion enters the battlefield, if {C} was spent to cast it, draw a card.
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact and/or creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

First strike
Trophy {W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Enchanted creature has first strike.

Flying
Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]

Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]
Cave Skulker has first strike as long as it’s equipped.

Flying
{3}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

Lifelink
Trophy {W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Enchanted creature has lifelink.

Flying
Trophy {1}{W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Enchanted creature has flying.

Flash
{1}, Sacrifice Pouncing Hyena: Destroy target artifact or enchantment
When Lanoa Truthspeaker enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life if you control another creature with base power 2 or less.

When Wandering Outcast enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Wandering Outcast has resilience as long as it’s enchanted. [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]

Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]
When Stubborn Ceros enters the battlefield, return target creature card with base power 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Destroy target artifact or equipped creature.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can’t attack, block, or be the target of equip abilities.
Destroy target creature if it’s enchanted, equipped, or has a counter on it.
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If that creature has vigilance, it gains lifelink until end of turn. Otherwise, untap it.
Whenever you cast an Aura spell that targets a Human you control, copy that spell. [i](The copy becomes a token.)[/i]
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Each creature you control with base power 2 or less gains first strike until end of turn.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.

When Rugged Survivor dies, if it was enchanted, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with base power 2 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Double strike
Trophy {2}{W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Enchanted creature has double strike.

First strike
Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]

Flash
Trophy {1}{W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2.
When Besieged Goliath enters the battlefield, if there are four or more card types among permanents you control, it deals 3 damage to up to one target tapped creature and you gain 3 life.

Whenever Lanoa Paragon enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to up to one target tapped creature.
Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]
Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Hunt-Band Leader, create a 2/1 white Human Hunter creature token.
Triumph of the Hunt deals damage equal to the number of creatures you control to target creature or planeswalker. Count each creature you control with base power 2 or less as two creatures.
When Spine of the Tyrant Lizard enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Spine of the Tyrant Lizard leaves the battlefield.

When Timeless Patience enters the battlefield, you may exile up to one target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

Artifact spells and colorless spells cost {1} more to cast.
Activated abilities of artifacts and colorless permanents cost {1} more to activate unless they’re mana abilities.
{T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast a noncreature spell or activate abilities of noncreature permanents.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or pay {U}.
Counter target spell.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} or {C}.

Enchant creature
When Aching Weariness enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{C}. If you do, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step.
Draw two cards. Then discard two cards unless you sacrifice an artifact.
Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless {C} was spent to cast this spell.
The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can’t be blocked this turn.
Draw a card.
Tap target nonland permanent. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step. If {C} was spent to cast this spell, instead return that permanent to its owner’s hand.
When Altar of the Acuno enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, scry 1, then draw a card.

{1}{C}: Choose one —
• Wily Dimetrodon gains hexproof until end of turn.
• Wily Dimetrodon can’t be blocked this turn.

When Ambush Tyrant enters the battlefield, tap up to one target creature. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]

Flying
Whenever a nontoken artifact or creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}{C}. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of that permanent.

When Breaching Relict enters the battlefield, for each player, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls not named Breaching Relict. Return the exiled permanents to the battlefield under their owners’ control at the beginning of the next end step.

Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a bone counter on Necromancer’s Influence.
{U}: Until end of turn, Necromancer’s Influence becomes a X/X Skeleton creature with vigilance, where X is the number of bone counters on it.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or pay {2}.
{1}{C}: Acuno Chieftain gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

When you cast this spell, copy it. [i](The copy becomes a token.)[/i]
{2}, Sacrifice Carved Idols: Draw a card.
Put target artifact card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Equip {2} or {C}
{4}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. If {C}{C} was spent to activate this ability, that permanent doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. As long as you’ve created a token this turn, if that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

Target player sacrifices a creature.
Craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
Destroy target creature or enchantment you don’t control. If its mana value was 3 or less, its controller loses 2 life.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
Target player discards two cards. Then if you’ve created a token this turn, exile that player’s graveyard.
Target creature you control gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn.
Slow Extinction deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life. If {C}{C} was spent to cast it, instead Slow Extinction deals 4 damage and you gain 4 life.

Flying
Trophy {1}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

When Yanamo Far-Rover enters the battlefield, craft a tool, then target player loses life equal to the number of tokens you’ve created this turn. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]

When Skulking Pack or enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Trophy {3}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
{1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Singer of the Bone Song: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Hunters you control.

Flash
When Mourning Ape enters the battlefield, return to the battlefield target creature card put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.
When Yanamo Entomber  enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.
Exile target card in a graveyard. Create an X/X black Skeleton creature token, where X is the exiled card’s mana value.
Destroy target creature or enchantment you don’t control with mana value 3 or less.

Return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control. If its mana value is 4 or less, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature’s mana value.

At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card. For each opponent who discarded a card that shares a card type with the card you discarded, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]

This spell costs {1} less to cast if you’ve created a token this turn.
You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
If a card would be put into an opponent’s graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
Spearfishing deals 3 damage to any target. If you’ve created a token this turn, it deals 4 damage instead.
Armed Encounter deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Equipment you control.

Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If you control another creature with base power 2 or less, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If {C} was spent to cast this spell, they get +1/+2 until end of turn instead.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw a card. Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

Whenever Stonehead Bow becomes attached to a creature or equipped creature attacks, Stonehead Bow deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Equip {3}
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If that creature has base power 2 or less, scry 1.

Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Up to two target creatures can’t block this turn.
Craft two tools [i](Create two tokens that are each either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
{4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Speaker of the Five Tribes: Speaker of the Five Tribes deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. Activate only if you control another creature with power 4 or greater.

When Weaver of Hides enters the battlefield, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
Whenever Weaver of Hides attacks, you may pay {C}. If you do, attach an equipment you control to it.
You may cast Lurking Carnivore as though it had flash as long as you’ve created a token this turn.
Whenever Cave Intruder attacks, up to one other target creature gets +2/+0 and gains menace until end of turn.

Reach
When Hunted Moa dies, craft a tool for each other creature you control. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]

Haste
Whenever Prey Snatcher attacks, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.

Haste
When Pouncing Thylacoleo enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Trophy {R} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]

Stolen Fire deals 2 damage to each creature that isn’t equipped.

Whenever a creature you control with base power 2 or less attacks, Memories of the Amatar deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
Destroy target artifact or land. If {C} was spent to cast Glacier’s Edge, it deals 2 damage to that permanent’s controller.

Flash
When Stone Axe enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip {3}

Craft a tool, then you may attach an Equipment you control to target creature you control. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may unattach an equipment from a creature you control.
Patient Shot deals 3 damage to target creature with flying. If the additional cost was paid, instead destroy that creature.
{T}: Add {C}.

Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Destroy up to two target artifact tokens.
When Languid Leopard enters the battlefield, you may pay {C}. If you do, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
When Primordial Siltwader enters the battlefield, if there are four or more card types among permanents you control, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

Flash
This spell can’t be countered.
Whenever you spend {C} to cast a creature spell, that spell can’t be countered.

{C}, Sacrifice Archaeotherium: Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Return target noncreature permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

Implacable Herd can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Implacable Herd by Humans and by equipped creatures.

As long as Prowling Tracker is equipped, Hunters you control have deathtouch.
Whenever another Hunter enters the battlefield under your control, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
Exile target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it gains trample until end of turn.

Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]
Other attacking creatures you control with vigilance get +1/+1.

Whenever an artifact or creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, choose one that hasn’t been chosen this turn —
• Scry 2.
• Draw a card.

Equipped creatures you control have haste and trample.
Whenever Kuzam Champion deals combat damage to an opponent, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, as long as there are four or more card types among permanents you control, you may have target creature get +2/+2 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

Trophy {3}{W}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Enchanted creatures you control have lifelink and deathtouch.

Menace
When Ferocious Raptor deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Then discard a card unless you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
Other Hunters you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.

When Hunting Camp enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Wolf creature token.
Creatures you control with base power 2 or less get +1/+0.

When Stone Scavenger dies, add {C}.
Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]
When Igneous Sabertooth dies, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
When Wandering Granite enters the battlefield, exile up to two target cards in a single graveyard. If {C}{C} was spent to cast Wandering Granite, instead exile all cards in that graveyard.
{T}: Add {C} or one mana of any color.

When Soul of Fire enters the battlefield, search your library for a card named Bones of the Earth or a card named Timeless Heartwood, reveal it, shuffle, then put it on top of your library.
Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Soul of Fire deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Equipped creature gets +1/+0
Equip {1}
Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}.

Dour Megalith enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {C}.

Fallen Sentinel enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {C}.

Frozen River enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {C}.

Portal Tomb enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {C}.

Scoured Bluffs enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {C}.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

Vigilance
{GU}, {T}: Add {C}{C}.

{W}{U} RESILIENCE Young warriors attack early before returning to guard the tribe.
{U}{B} SACRIFICE Life is harsh. Survive where others don’t.
{B}{R} TOOLCRAFT Show your strength by creating a steady stream of tokens.
{R}{G} EQUIPMENT Sharpen your tools for the hunt and bring down your foe.
{G}{W} CARD TYPES Gather cards of many types to broaden your options.
{W}{B} AURAS Great beasts are hunted for their hides, their tusks, and your victory.
{B}{G} HUNTERS The many hands of your Hunter creatures bring down large prey.
{G}{U} COLORLESS Ancient tools and tribal magic power your spells.
{U}{R} FEROCIOUS Might makes right with creatures with power 4 or greater.
{R}{W} WEENIES Base power 2 or less is no obstacle when you works together.

Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}.
If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, counter that spell instead.
{X}, {T}: Target player mills X cards. If at least five {C} was spent to activate this ability, instead that player mills twice X cards.
Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever you cast an Aura spell or whenever an enchanted creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.special_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
[+1]: Draw a card. Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
[-X]: Put an artifact or creature card from your hand with mana value X or less onto the battlefield.

cards.rules_text: Destroy all artifacts and creatures.
Exile target nonland, nonartifact permanent an opponent controls. You lose life equal to its mana value.
Search your library for a green creature or planeswalker card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield with an additional X +1/+1 or loyalty counters on it, then shuffle.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Aura you control.
Create X 1/1 white Wolf creature tokens.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Craft a tool.
[0]: Raukell, the Neolith deals damage to target creature equal to the number of loyalty counters on her. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Raukell.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Artifacts and creatures you control have indestructible.”

cards.rules_text:
When Amnia, Shaper of Stone enters the battlefield, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
If an effect would create one or more artifact tokens under your control, it creates three times that many of those tokens instead.

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a lure counter on Tranquil Expanse, then you may put a nonland permanent card with mana value equal to or less than the number of lure counters on Tranquil Expanse from your hand onto the battlefield.
If an opponent would create one or more tokens, instead you and that player each create half that many of those tokens, rounded up.
Sturdy Pangolin enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When it does, if at least {C}{C}{C} was spent to cast it, it fights up to one target creature you don’t control.

Each player chooses up to three lands they control, then shuffles their hand, graveyard, and all other permanents they control into their library, then draws seven cards and crafts two tools.
Exile Dawn of Time.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {B}. Activate only if you control a Mountain.
{T}: Add {R}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R}. Activate only if you control a Forest.
{T}: Add {G}. Activate only if you control a Mountain.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {G}. Activate only if you control a Plains.
{T}: Add {W}. Activate only if you control a Forest.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W}. Activate only if you control an Island.
{T}: Add {U}. Activate only if you control a Plains.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.
{T}: Add {B}. Activate only if you control an Island.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if {C} was spent to cast this spell. Then it fights target creature an opponent controls.

Whenever a player casts a spell during your turn, put a blood counter on Accursed Bloodpainter.
Each opponent’s maximum hand size is reduced by one for each blood counter on Accursed Bloodpainter.

Whenever a creature you control with base power 2 or less dies, put a prey counter on The Wrong Cave.
As long as The Wrong Cave has three or more prey counters on it, it’s a 5/5 Dragon creature with flying.

When Raukell of the Amatar enters the battlefield, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
{B}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a token: Destroy target creature.

When Ancient Ice dies, reveal the top card of your library. If it’s an instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 4 or less from among them or your hand onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Permanents being put into a graveyard from the battlefield don’t cause abilities to trigger.
Each player draws a card, then you draw an additional X cards, where X is the total number of cards drawn by players this turn.

{T}, Pay 1 life: Craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
{1}, Sacrifice two artifacts and/or creatures: Draw a card.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.
Strip Clean deals X damage to any target.

Whenever Keystone Predator or enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, create a 1/1 white Wolf creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on up to one creature.
Trophy {3}{W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]

{C}: Young Chief becomes a Human Hunter with base power and toughness 2/2.
{C}{C}: If Young Chief is a Hunter, put a vigilance counter on it and it becomes a Human Hunter Artificer with base power and toughness 4/4.
{C}{C}{C}: If Young Chief is an Artificer, you may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
Each opponent discards three cards. For each card fewer than three that an opponent discards this way, that player sacrifices a nonland permanent.
{T}, Sacrifice Magma Croaker: Add {R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell. When you do, that spell can’t be countered and gains “This spell deals 2 damage to any target.”

Flying, vigilance
Whenever Imperious Skywing attacks, you may pay {X}, where X is Imperious Skywing’s power. If you do, return up to one target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield, then put a +1/+1 counter on Imperious Skywing.

Flying
Protection from colorless [i](This creature can’t be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything colorless.)[/i]
Creatures your opponents control without flying get -1/-0.

This spell costs {B} more to cast during your first or second turns of the game.
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Haste
Whenever Tribal Agitator attacks, defending player crafts a tool. [i](They create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
You may put a creature card with mana value X or less from your hand onto the battlefield, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

Blood-Bond Pack’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control with vigilance.
Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]

Choose one or both — 
• Copy target spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
• Counter target spell.

If you would create one or more tokens, you may put that many lore counters on Tale of the Great Beast instead.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Tale of the Great Beast. If you do, each opponent loses X life and you create an X/X black Demon Dinosaur creature token, where X is the number of lore counters on Tale of the Great Beast.

Sacrifice all permanents you control, then reveal that many cards from the top of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield tapped, then cast any number of spells revealed this way without paying their mana costs, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play lands from the top of your library.
You may cast spells from the top of your library if you pay an additional {C} to cast them.

This spell can’t be countered.
Up to two target permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

Rapacious Fledgling or enchanted creature has flying and first strike as long as it’s attacking.
Trophy {4}{W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]

Vestiges of Time enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.
Players can’t cast noncreature spells with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Vestiges of Time.

Deathtouch
Whenever a creature dies, craft a tool. [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]

First strike
Whenever Acuno Messenger becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you and that player each draw a card.
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {3}. If you do, return target creature you don’t control with lesser power to its owner’s hand.

Trample, haste
Ancient Predator enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it plus an additional +1/+1 counter for each {C} spent to cast it.

Resilience [i](This creature can’t block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a vigilance counter on it.)[/i]
As long as Hardy Survivalist has a vigilance counter on it, other creatures you control have resilience.

Hunters you control have lifelink and deathtouch.
Whenever a non-Human creature dies, you may pay 4 life. If you do, create a 2/1 white Human Hunter creature token.

Choose a creature type, then choose one —
• Dying Breed deals 3 damage to each planeswalker and each creature of the chosen type.
• Dying Breed deals 3 damage to each planeswalker and each creature not of the chosen type.
Your life total becomes the total power of creatures you control.
Equipment you control have equip {C}{C}.

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on target nonland permanent you control.
{2}{C}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the number of permanents you control with a spore counter on them. Activate only once each turn.

Whenever Stalking Jaguar or enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, that player discards a card. If they can’t, you draw a card.
Trophy {3}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Then those creatures fight each other.

As Petrified Wilds enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of the chosen color.

End the turn. [i](Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and “this turn” and “until end of turn” effects end.)[/i]

You may sacrifice two artifacts rather than pay this spell’s mana cost.
{T}: Add {C}.
Activated abilities of artifacts can’t be activated.

Lifelink
Whenever another creature with base power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, Skittish Raptor deals 1 damage to any target.

Flash
When Primordial Lurker enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Counter target creature spell.
• Primordial Lurker deals 3 damage to up to one target creature.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control and has “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, craft a tool.” [i](Create either an artifact token with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}” or an Equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
Equip {3}

Whenever Frenzied Megatherium is dealt combat damage, create a token that’s a copy of it.
{3}{G}: Frenzied Megatherium must be blocked this turn if able.

Exile each creature. Return each creature you own exiled this way to the battlefield. For each other creature exiled this way, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of that player’s next end step.

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Exile the top card of target player’s library and up to one target card from that player’s graveyard. You may cast those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast them.

If a nontoken artifact or enchantment would be put into an opponent’s graveyard from the battlefield, exile that card instead.
You may cast spells from among cards exiled with Broad-Crowned Stag, and you may spend mana from snow sources as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.
When a player casts a spell during another player’s turn, sacrifice Aeons Past. If you do, each of that player’s opponents draws three cards.
Destroy target permanent that’s one or more colors.

Trample, haste
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, exile Rugged Brontodon then return it to your hand.
Trophy {1}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]

If you would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, you may create an X/X green Dinosaur creature token instead, where X is the number of counters that would have been placed on that permanent.

When Progress enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent with mana value 4 or less that’s one or more colors.
Evoke—Exile a card from your hand with {C} in its mana cost. [i](You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it’s sacrificed when it enters.)[/i]

When Prehistory enters the battlefield or attacks, exile target permanent or target card from a graveyard.
Prehistory’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards exiled with it.
Prehistory has protection from each card type among cards exiled with it.

Flying, lifelink
Tokens you create enter the battlefield as a copy of Goliath Godwing.
Deathless Gargantosaur costs an additional {X} to cast, where X is your life total.

Vigilance
Winter’s Sovereign has ward {1}{C} as long as it’s untapped.
Whenever Winter’s Sovereign deals combat damage to an opponent, you may tap it and put a stun counter on it. If you do, draw two cards.

Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand or your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If you cast a spell from your graveyard this way, exile it as it resolves.

First strike, haste
Whenever Apex of the Wild attacks, it deals 3 damage to target creature an opponent controls with the greatest power.

Until end of turn, if a red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
Colossal Eruption deals 2 damage to each creature, planeswalker, and opponent.

Indestructible
Trophy {3}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
Enchanted creature has indestructible
